rule: All company names present in the input text must be extracted and listed under the "Company names" section.
input: Sony and Nintendo continue to be leaders in the gaming industry.
output:
Company names: Sony, Nintendo  
People names: -||-  
Specific topics: gaming industry  
General themes: leadership, competition in gaming
evaluation:
The format of the output complies with the desired format as described in the chatbot's description. The output is organized according to the specified categories: "Company names," "People names," "Specific topics," and "General themes," each followed by content, even though the "People names" section is empty. The use of "-||-" as a placeholder suggests there were no entries to extract, which aligns with how the format intends to handle categories with no information. The separation of sections and listing aligns with the requested structure.

No violation.
OK
